name: Free-Roaming Gohma (Autoghost)
author: ywkls
info: A larger than normal gohma that can move in any direction.
description: A big gohma that moves about the room in any direction and periodically shoots fireballs at you. Only vulnerable from the front with arrows when its eye is open. Sprites provided by DaLInk.Update- 6-3-15- Tweaked graphics to make it animated, changed colors slightly.8-16-15- Added explosive death animation.2-21-21- Changed sprites to new animation supplied by Ether.2-25-21Updated sprites slightlyAdded demo video
setup:
Requires-

std.zh
string.zh
ghost.zh

Set up combos in this order- Eye closed up, down, left, right, eye open up, down, left and right. Use the top left tile of each 2 x 2 graphic as the combo in each case. Put the combo number of the first of these in Miscellaneous Attribute 11.
